TextLibrary.Text: The Ogre Mage is too strong for you. You must return again later.
You have defeated the Ogre Mage. You take the banner that has been made from the Spine of Sartek.
Tauron adds another piece of Sartek to his collection.
You must travel to Gluk in search of the Ogre Mage
You must return back to the Horned Temple to claim your reward.
